description: Don't let warm temps stop you from reaching your next peak. The lightweight, moisture-wicking, and quick-drying Men's Transporter Short-Sleeve T-Shirt moves with you on your adventure when Mother Nature's cranking the heat. Forward-set side seams ensure you stay comfortable whether you've got a harness or a backpack on, while flatlock seams reduce chafing during high-intensity climbs. At the back, the drop-tail hem provides extra coverage and won't roll up during tough holds or far reaches.
name: Marmot Transporter Tee SS - Mens
